pkgmetadata.longdescription: Efficient and Accurate P-Value Computation for Position Weight Matrices // In putative Transcription Factor Binding Sites (TFBSs) identification from sequence/alignments, we are interested in the significance of certain match score. TFMPvalue provides the accurate calculation of P-value with score threshold for Position Weight Matrices, or the score with given P-value. It is an interface to code originally made available by Helene Touzet and Jean-Stephane Varre, 2007, Algorithms Mol Biol:2, 15. Touzet and Varre (2007) DOI:10.1186/1748-7188-2-15.
